title: {'zh': '纯儒之士', 'en': 'Complete Confucian'}
description: {'zh': '「若论文学造诣，我定不落于人后。但若是躬行君子，我未可称也。」', 'en': '"In literature, perhaps I am equal to others. But I cannot manifest the behaviour of the noble man."'}

title: {'zh': '义从胡酋', 'en': 'The Loyal Barbarian'}
description: {'zh': '颇具讽刺的是，此人统帅义胡却反抗皇帝，毫无忠义可言。', 'en': 'Ironically, this one has proven anything but loyal by raising his standard against the emperor.'}

title: {'zh': '铸钟南宫', 'en': 'Architect of the Southern Palace'}
description: {'zh': '「前楼若完工，必是一美景，其可转水入宫！」', 'en': '"Once complete, the Anterior Pavillion will be a delight to behold – it\'ll even have a water feature!"'}

title: {'zh': '有志官吏', 'en': 'Aspiring Official'}
description: {'zh': '渴求飞黄腾达之人，往往比他人……在道德方面更加“灵活”。', 'en': "He who aspires to greater personal advancement tends to be more... 'morally flexible' than his peers."}

title: {'zh': '众人领袖', 'en': 'Marshal of Men'}
description: {'zh': '有些人生来便是领导他人的……尤其喜欢身先士卒，为属下以身作则。', 'en': 'Some people are born to lead others… and preferably from the very front, as an example to their followers.'}

title: {'zh': '旷世逸才', 'en': 'Ritual Master'}
description: {'zh': '此人熟知手上政务的方方面面，是其所选领域内的大师。', 'en': 'This one knows every aspect of the procedures he has been tasked with administrating, becoming a master in his chosen field.'}

title: {'zh': '忠诚子嗣', 'en': 'Loyal Son'}
description: {'zh': '曹嵩之子定会忠于其家族，赴汤蹈火，在所不辞。', 'en': 'The offspring of Cao Song has remained loyal to his family through thick and thin.'}

title: {'zh': '雄心巨贾', 'en': 'Ambitious Tycoon'}
description: {'zh': '对于决心建功立业的实干家来说，为了获取真正的实权，付出任何代价都不算什么。', 'en': 'For the determined entrepreneur, no price is too high for the acquisition of real, workable power.'}

title: {'zh': '湖海之士', 'en': 'Man For All Seasons'}
description: {'zh': '偶尔，仅仅是偶尔，权力并未堕落至腐败，而是结出了有利他人和普罗慈善的果实。', 'en': 'Sometimes, just sometimes, power fails to corrupt, and instead leads to altruism and charity.'}

title: {'zh': '才华洋溢', 'en': 'Abundant Talent'}
description: {'zh': '此人的才能早在青年时期便崭露头角，并持之以恒，如同永远处于仲春的繁花般盛开。', 'en': "This man's gifts were noted at a young age and he continues to blossom, as if perpetually held in spring's sweet bloom."}

title: {'zh': '因父得名', 'en': 'Living Legacy'}
description: {'zh': '说是家传之才也好，裙带关系也好，就看你是相信人性本善还是本恶了。', 'en': 'You can call it inherited ability or mere nepotism, depending on the level of your cynicism.'}

title: {'zh': '无耻谋士', 'en': 'Unscrupulous Advisor'}
description: {'zh': '天下没有免费的午餐。', 'en': 'Everything has a price it seems.'}

title: {'zh': '红颜祸水', 'en': 'Deadly Beauty'}
description: {'zh': '貂蝉利用其倾国绝色来隐藏其心中的抱负，是为能搅动风云，推翻暴政之人。', 'en': 'Diao Chan uses her enchanting beauty to hide her ambition; one which can topple tyrants.'}

title: {'zh': '登天之龙', 'en': 'Rising Dragon'}
description: {'zh': '此人必有所成——尤其是在身处帝都宫廷的残酷世界里。', 'en': 'This one is going places - specifically, up in the cut-throat world of Imperial administration.'}

title: {'zh': '坦率公正', 'en': 'Honest & Fair'}
description: {'zh': '此人以其为人诚实、谈吐率直、处事公正而备受敬仰。', 'en': 'This man is admired for his honest, plain-speaking ways and even-handed manner in all things.'}

title: {'zh': '官员表率', 'en': 'Model Governor'}
description: {'zh': '此人懂得何时抚慰人心，何时展露铁腕。', 'en': 'This one understands when to use the velvet glove and when to reveal the iron hand beneath.'}

title: {'zh': '铁腕执行', 'en': 'Enforcer'}
description: {'zh': '「我听说这一带最近有盗匪出没。我？不不，我完全不知道这些事……」', 'en': '"I\'ve heard that bandits have been abroad around these parts recently. Me? No, I know nothing about such things..."'}

title: {'zh': '善变天子', 'en': 'The Inconstant Emperor'}
description: {'zh': '行事反复无常之人最终必将前后不一、缺乏沉稳，乃至不可依靠……', 'en': 'He who flits and fluctuates risks appearing inconsistent, unsteady and, eventually, unstable...'}

title: {'zh': '大汉明君', 'en': 'The Great Emperor of the Han'}
description: {'zh': '在排除万难中兴大汉之后，世人皆称此人为大汉明君。', 'en': 'Having overcome adversity, this one is now recognised as a great emperor of the Han.'}

title: {'zh': '史侯', 'en': 'Lord Shi'}
description: {'zh': '皇帝担心皇子刘辩夭折，便命道人史子眇将其在远离皇都的地方养大，因此刘辩又被称为“史侯”。', 'en': "Due to fears for his health, Liu Bian was raised away from the capital by the famed Taoist, Shi Zimiao, earning him the nickname 'Lord Shi'."}

title: {'zh': '精妙操手', 'en': 'Subtle Manipulator'}
description: {'zh': '一向能谋巧算，一向诡计多端，表面平静之下，向来波诡云谲。向来如此。', 'en': 'Always plotting, always scheming, always something beneath the obvious. Always.'}

title: {'zh': '含怨强敌', 'en': 'Bitter Adversary'}
description: {'zh': '「他们本可以成为挚友，可惜人生总不如意……」', 'en': '"In another life, they could\'ve been best friends. However, that\'s just not how the bones fell…"'}

title: {'zh': '平叛义军', 'en': 'Destroyer of Rebels'}
description: {'zh': '傅燮不仅是一位声名显赫的将军——堪称黄巾军的克星——而且还是一位精通文法的大儒。', 'en': 'Fu Xie is not only a general of no little repute – the scourge of the Yellow Turbans, perhaps – but also a skilled writer.'}

title: {'zh': '尚药监', 'en': 'Officer for Medicines'}
description: {'zh': '「经过了仔细的诊察，我认为最好以水蛭放血。」', 'en': '"After a thorough examination, I\'ve decided the best way forward is a course of leeches."'}

title: {'zh': '学界新秀', 'en': 'Budding Scholar'}
description: {'zh': '前途无量的青年才俊，未来大有可为。', 'en': 'An up-and-coming young mind, of which great things are expected.'}

title: {'zh': '坚定工兵', 'en': 'Determined Sapper'}
description: {'zh': '无论何等工事壁垒，皆起于意志坚定军匠', 'en': 'Burrowing under tree and hill, no defences are a match for the mind of a determined sapper.'}

title: {'zh': '何氏之友', 'en': 'Friend of the He'}
description: {'zh': '「姓何的？哦，我们很久以前就认识了。让我给你好好讲讲……」', 'en': '"Do I know the He? Oh yes, we go waaaaay back. I could tell you stories..."'}

title: {'zh': '白波宿将', 'en': 'White Wave Veteran'}
description: {'zh': '许多战斗——许多生命——都在这位鬓发斑白的贼徒眼前逝去。', 'en': 'Many battles – and many lives – have passed before the eyes of this grizzled bandit.'}

title: {'zh': '何氏屠夫', 'en': 'The Butcher of the He'}
description: {'zh': '吾虽持屠户戮兽之斧，贼子狂徒亦可轻易劈翻。', 'en': 'The axe that cleaves through beast can so easily be turned to rend man too.'}

title: {'zh': '谦逊坚定', 'en': 'Modest & Stalwart'}
description: {'zh': '义真不但心坚义贞，更以端庄本性辅之。', 'en': "This one's unwavering loyalty is matched only by their demure nature. "}

title: {'zh': '望族子弟', 'en': 'Scion of Gold'}
description: {'zh': '闪光的不一定是金子，有时候，天赋显得更为耀眼。', 'en': 'Not all that glitters is gold. Sometimes, talent shines even brighter.'}

title: {'zh': '仲裁天下', 'en': 'Arbiter of the Planets'}
description: {'zh': '纳甲六爻、易数八卦。术数杂繁，天意难料。泱泱国祚，拳拳我心。但为君故，测预必得。', 'en': 'To decide between two astronomical methods is a most difficult and perplexing conundrum, but the emperor must have his forecast.'}

title: {'zh': '莺娇婉娩', 'en': 'The Nightingale'}
description: {'zh': '晨谣应风唱，仍逊文姬诗。', 'en': 'Even the morningsong that drifts on the wind cannot compare to the sweet lyric of the muse.'}

title: {'zh': '江南闺秀', 'en': 'Daughter of the Southlands'}
description: {'zh': '南方聚灵秀，赠与贵胄家：二女长成，心地善良，意志坚定。', 'en': 'The south produces boons to its nobles: two daughters, fair of mind and strong of resolve.'}

title: {'zh': '忠诚不渝', 'en': 'Ever-faithful'}
description: {'zh': '无论贫富贵贱，相互扶持，患难与共，此乃婚姻之道。', 'en': 'To support one another, through both the fruitful times and the barren, is the essence of marriage.'}

title: {'zh': '江南闺秀', 'en': 'Daughter of the Southlands'}
description: {'zh': '贞孝良人，天赐众福。', 'en': 'To the filial and the devout, life will give not one, but two measures of its respect.'}

title: {'zh': '潜伏凶虐', 'en': 'Creeping Dread'}
description: {'zh': '死亡的化身。慢刀乍现，出其不意，一击致命。', 'en': 'Death personified; the slow knife that appears, unexpected and lethal.'}

title: {'zh': '陈王', 'en': 'Prince of Chen'}
description: {'zh': '刘宠并非太子，却是最为勤勉，最受百姓爱戴的宗王。', 'en': 'Liu Chong is not the heir apparent, but is the prince most active and beloved by his people.'}

title: {'zh': '算圣', 'en': 'Mathematical Sage'}
description: {'zh': '此人精通数字，凭之运作施为，令人叹为观止，激动人心，以至隐有忧虑……', 'en': 'What this one can do with numbers is impressive, exciting, and almost a little worrying…'}

title: {'zh': '久历四方', 'en': 'Wanderer'}
description: {'zh': '“无论集镇港口，贩夫走卒，所到之处，所遇之人，皆可从中琢磨学习，受益匪浅，卿知否？”', 'en': '"There is much to be learned in every town, every port, and from every person you encounter, friend."'}

title: {'zh': '董侯', 'en': 'Lord Dong'}
description: {'zh': '虽然董侯已经不理政事，但太后依然在关注着他与他的言论', 'en': 'Though he officially retired from political life some time ago, the empress-dowager still has a care for Lord Dong and his views.'}

title: {'zh': '心腹大将', 'en': 'Trusting Warlord'}
description: {'zh': '宽宏大量，慷慨仁义，然后遭人欺骗。这便是轻听轻信的宿命。', 'en': 'It is the curse of the trusting to be magnanimous, generous, and ultimately tricked.'}

title: {'zh': '好客东家', 'en': 'Gracious Host'}
description: {'zh': '“请进，我的朋友，请进！喝茶么，还是来点更猛的……？”', 'en': '"Come in, my friend, come in! Tea, perhaps? Or something stronger…?"'}

title: {'zh': '观星者', 'en': 'Stargazer'}
description: {'zh': '繁星点缀于夜幕之上，星罗棋布，璀璨生辉。', 'en': 'The stars paint a picture on the canvas of night, mesmerising and beautiful.'}

title: {'zh': '儒雅俊杰', 'en': 'Gentleman Cadet'}
description: {'zh': '要论名士风流，此君独揽风骚。', 'en': 'If one wishes to learn the intricacies of gentlemanly behaviour, one need look no further.'}

title: {'zh': '治理楷模', 'en': 'Paragon of Governance'}
description: {'zh': '生在钟鸣鼎食之家，既可滋生恶习，也能孕育美德。所幸，此人良善至极，但善恶往往一念之间。', 'en': "Being born to a vast family can feed either vice or virtue. Luckily, this one is kind to a fault, but it could've gone either way."}

title: {'zh': '任能辨才', 'en': 'Judge of Talent'}
description: {'zh': '“是，是，我们会把你带到他们面前，他们便会知道。他们向来都知道……”', 'en': '"Yes yes, we will bring you before them, and they will know. They ALWAYS know…"'}

title: {'zh': '德劭导师', 'en': 'Respected Mentor'}
description: {'zh': '一位世所罕见的良师益友，只可惜命途多舛。', 'en': 'A peerless teacher and favoured friend, though chronically misfortunate.'}

title: {'zh': '百姓守护', 'en': 'Guardian of the People'}
description: {'zh': '“施压于民，绝无益处。水能载舟，亦能覆舟。”', 'en': '"There is nothing to be gained from oppressing the people; they, ultimately, will decide our fate."'}

title: {'zh': '贫贱之骑', 'en': 'Penniless Knight'}
description: {'zh': '翻山越岭，走街串巷，人们传扬着这位勇士的事迹，然而勇士本人依旧是个谜。', 'en': "From town to town, they speak of this one's deeds, yet the warrior himself remains a wandering mystery."}

title: {'zh': '谏议大夫', 'en': 'Counsellor Remonstrant'}
description: {'zh': '尽管经验不足，这位尚书仆射仍不失为深藏智谋，字字珠玑。', 'en': 'Wisdoms pours from every word of this able, if inexperienced, counsellor.'}

title: {'zh': '厌马之人', 'en': 'Hippophobe'}
description: {'zh': '一朝见烈马，十年怕马骡', 'en': "A psychological fear of horses is not entirely unreasonable when you've seen what they can do."}

title: {'zh': '汉朝忠臣', 'en': 'Loyalist of the Han'}
description: {'zh': '尽管困难重重，无论所遇何事，他们都将拱卫汉室。', 'en': 'Against all odds, to whatever end, they will defend the Han.'}

title: {'zh': '告灾先觉', 'en': 'Harbinger of Chaos'}
description: {'zh': '此人已经看到了天下的未来。骚乱正在酝酿', 'en': 'This one has seen the way the world is going. Tumult is imminent.'}

title: {'zh': '缮修玉堂', 'en': 'Architect of the Jade Hall'}
description: {'zh': '顺帝的殿堂曾经无比辉煌，如今却因年久失修而倾颓。此人奉命对其进行修缮', 'en': "Emperor Shun's hall was a thing of unbridled splendour, but has fallen into some disrepair. This man has been tasked with its maintenance."}

title: {'zh': '僭号河陇', 'en': 'Lord of the Sources'}
description: {'zh': '其人杀敌无数，手下败将，或可尸骸蔽野，血流成河。', 'en': 'Like the river flows, so too does the blood of his enemies.'}

title: {'zh': '国之耳目', 'en': 'Eyes & Ears'}
description: {'zh': '谋士如此之多，谁会怀疑再多了一人呢……？', 'en': 'Amongst so many advisors, who would suspect one more…?'}

title: {'zh': '残酷叛贼', 'en': 'Cruel Turncoat'}
description: {'zh': '对于那些视荣华富贵为一切的人来说，所谓道义，一文不值。', 'en': 'Honour is nothing to those for whom gold and glory loom large over all.'}

title: {'zh': '贤才伯乐', 'en': 'Seeker of Talent'}
description: {'zh': '“卿之良才……实乃深不可测……”', 'en': '"I see in you the ability to…. Yes, yes! Something FAR greater…"'}

title: {'zh': '财政天才', 'en': 'Financial Genius'}
description: {'zh': '唯利是图之贸，为人不齿。此人却深谙此学，最善空手套白狼', 'en': "Having mastered finance's decidedly black arts, this one is able to generate funds almost from thin air."}

title: {'zh': '千帆海贼', 'en': 'Pirate of the Thousand Sails'}
description: {'zh': '此等水贼，有精兵坚船在侧，更有雄心万丈藏于胸中！', 'en': 'This pirate rides with an armada at his back and the call to glory in his soul!'}

title: {'zh': '力克贪腐', 'en': 'Fighter Against Corruption'}
description: {'zh': '无论何处，但凡有不忠不义之人的迹象，此人必将其连根铲除', 'en': 'This one seeks unscrupulous dishonesty wherever it may lurk. It will be rooted out.'}

title: {'zh': '饱读之士', 'en': 'Bookish Scholar'}
description: {'zh': '卷帙浩繁，连篇累牍，即便仅仅片刻，观之亦如坠隔世……', 'en': 'The words of these tomes take the reader to another world, if only temporarily…'}

title: {'zh': '熟知仪礼', 'en': 'Master of Ceremonies'}
description: {'zh': '“大人，大人！听吾一言！”', 'en': '"My lords, my lords! Please attend carefully!"'}

title: {'zh': '棋坛圣手', 'en': 'Chess Grandmaster'}
description: {'zh': '通常来说，赢家仅是未犯最后一个错的人。', 'en': '"Typically, however, the winner is just the player who made the penultimate mistake."'}

title: {'zh': '忠于袁氏', 'en': 'Loyal Yuan'}
description: {'zh': '对家族的忠贞高于一切。', 'en': 'Loyalty to family above all.'}

title: {'zh': '地公将军', 'en': 'General of the Land'}
description: {'zh': '不配太平道者，皆应血归黄土。', 'en': 'Zhang Bao nourishes the land with the blood of the undeserving.'}

title: {'zh': '天公将军', 'en': 'General of Heaven'}
description: {'zh': '苍天已死，黄天当立！吾领黄巾道众，顺黄天传太平！', 'en': 'Zhang Jue leads the Yellow Rebellion, driven by divine purpose!'}

title: {'zh': '人公将军', 'en': 'General of the People'}
description: {'zh': '吾善唤起民众，引之斗暴政。', 'en': 'Zhang Liang supports the people, driving them to war against an oppressive regime.'}

title: {'zh': '南阳灾祸', 'en': 'Scourge of Nanyang'}
description: {'zh': '农人低声谈论此事，而南阳百姓则哀嚎连天。', 'en': 'Peasants speak of this one in hushed whispers, whilst those of Nanyang howl in anguish.'}

title: {'zh': '皇帝假父', 'en': 'Imperial Father'}
description: {'zh': '虽然并没有血缘关系，但此人就如同天子的亲生父亲一般', 'en': 'Though they share no blood, this man has been like a father to the emperor.'}

title: {'zh': '无双国士', 'en': 'Peerless Protégé'}
description: {'zh': '如有任务下达，此人必定躬身完成。', 'en': 'If there is a task to perform, this one will see it done.'}

title: {'zh': '玄龟御敌', 'en': 'The Turtle'}
description: {'zh': '“且慢，尔等胆敢来闯龟阵！无人可破吾之躯壳！”', 'en': '"Behold, you assault the Turtle! Nothing shall pierce my shell!"'}

title: {'zh': '皇帝假母', 'en': 'Imperial Mother'}
description: {'zh': '虽然并没有血缘关系，但此人就如同天子的亲生母亲一般', 'en': 'Though they are unrelated, this man has been as a mother to the emperor.'}

title: {'zh': '举贤之人', 'en': 'Nominator of Worth'}
description: {'zh': '真的，两个人能否合得来，此人一眼便知。', 'en': 'Truly, this one can see if two people will fit together, and if they will not.'}

title: {'zh': '前锋猛将', 'en': 'Frontline General'}
description: {'zh': '「我也是你们中的一员，我了解你们的苦痛！」', 'en': '"I am one of you, I know your pain!"'}

title: {'zh': '辅佐将领', 'en': 'Auxiliary Leader'}
description: {'zh': '“无论尔等出身何处，但凡骁勇战士，吾来者不拒！”', 'en': '"I won\'t be the one to refuse good warriors, no matter where you hail from!"'}

title: {'zh': '老练刺客', 'en': 'Assassin'}
description: {'zh': '杀戮之事，一回生，二回熟。三四回后则如家常便饭。', 'en': 'After a few kills, a degree of finesse is developed; after a few more, death is just routine.'}

title: {'zh': '枕戈剚刃', 'en': 'Avenger'}
description: {'zh': '“杀叔之仇，不共戴天。”', 'en': '"You really shouldn\'t have killed my uncle."'}

title: {'zh': '熟手劫匪', 'en': 'Bandit'}
description: {'zh': '人生自是不公，唯死贱于苟活。兄弟，莫要惜钱失命！', 'en': '"Life isn\'t fair. It\'s just fairer than death, that\'s all."'}

title: {'zh': '暴虐之人', 'en': 'Brute'}
description: {'zh': '凶恣暴虐之徒不会懂得礼节与雅言', 'en': 'Niceties, wordplay, in fact, anything other than the coarsest violence is alien to this one.'}

title: {'zh': '江湖郎中', 'en': 'Charlatan'}
description: {'zh': '莫要轻信其言！此人最是表里不一……', 'en': 'Don’t believe a word! This person is not who they first appear to be…'}

title: {'zh': '蛊惑民心', 'en': 'Demagogue'}
description: {'zh': '道理无用！凭借迎合匹夫之识之能，哪怕名不正言不顺，往往照样如愿以偿。', 'en': "Rationality be damned! The ability to appeal to the rabble's basest views, no matter how wrong-headed, tends to get the desired result."}

title: {'zh': '贬谪士族', 'en': 'Disgraced Noble'}
description: {'zh': '“我必先将功赎罪，否则愧见父老乡亲。”', 'en': '"I can never return, of course, not until I have redeemed myself."'}

title: {'zh': '中饱私囊', 'en': 'Embezzler'}
description: {'zh': '府库的钱财落入了不义之人手中，此人显然难逃罪责。', 'en': 'Funds have been… misplaced, and this one is flagrantly, obviously, blatantly the guilty party.'}

title: {'zh': '铁面无私', 'en': 'Enforcer'}
description: {'zh': '花言巧语起不了实际作用，软硬兼施才是硬道理。', 'en': 'You can get a lot further in life with a kind word and a visible blade than you can with just a kind word.'}

title: {'zh': '在逃案犯', 'en': 'Escaped Convict'}
description: {'zh': '此人在经历了一番牢狱之灾和严刑拷打后得以逃出生天，现下可谓无所顾忌，毫无畏惧。', 'en': 'Having escaped custody and a punishment most-severe, this one is on the run, with little or nothing to lose.'}

title: {'zh': '在逃曹掾', 'en': 'Fugitive Officer'}
description: {'zh': '“吾并非杀妻之人！”', 'en': '"I didn\'t kill my wife!"'}

title: {'zh': '隐士', 'en': 'Hermit'}
description: {'zh': '能找出极力自己隐藏身份的人，此能力的确不同凡响。', 'en': 'To find one who does not wish to be found is an impressive, if not confounding, feat.'}

title: {'zh': '江湖术士', 'en': 'Magician'}
description: {'zh': '这难以置信的壮举并不只是欺骗，尽管要欺骗他人本身也不容易。', 'en': 'These scarcely believable feats are no mere acts of trickery, although such acts are themselves also surprisingly difficult.'}

title: {'zh': '智多星', 'en': 'Mastermind'}
description: {'zh': '“有始有终……”', 'en': '"I\'ve started, so I\'ll finish…"'}

title: {'zh': '唯利凶徒', 'en': 'Murderer'}
description: {'zh': '此人为达目的不择手段，为了一己私利可以做出任何下作之事……', 'en': 'When it comes to getting what they want, this person is not above the lowest, basest act one can commit…'}

title: {'zh': '绿林好汉', 'en': 'Pillager'}
description: {'zh': '“不论是你的土地还是他们的土地，通通都会属于我，这毫无疑问。”', 'en': '"What\'s yours is mine. What\'s theirs is mine. It\'s all mine, essentially."'}

title: {'zh': '妙手空空', 'en': 'Poacher'}
description: {'zh': '隔牖窥扉悉悉索索，深宵胠箧妙手空空', 'en': '"Clever girl…"'}

title: {'zh': '巧舌纳士', 'en': 'Ringleader'}
description: {'zh': '鼓动他人为其事业卖命的能力，自然是一把双刃剑。此人只要一开口，他人便会认真听从。', 'en': 'The ability to galvanise others to a cause can be both blessing and curse; regardless, when this one speaks, others listen keenly, and act.'}

title: {'zh': '多诈狡狯', 'en': 'Rogue'}
description: {'zh': '他们只需露出一丝苦笑，便几乎足以让人原谅他们的恶行。当然，只是几乎。', 'en': 'A flash of their wry smile is almost enough to forgive them their terrible deeds. Almost.'}

title: {'zh': '成事煞星', 'en': 'Saboteur'}
description: {'zh': '“你之后打算做些什么可不关我的事，那是其他人职责所在。”', 'en': '"What you do afterwards is not my concern. That is somebody else\'s job."'}

title: {'zh': '惯犯名偷', 'en': 'Thief'}
description: {'zh': '此人有些……这么说吧：你最好把东西看紧咯。', 'en': "This one is a bit… Put it this way: you'd best nail down what you want to hang on to."}

title: {'zh': '嗜酒如命', 'en': 'Town Drunk'}
description: {'zh': '此人一刻也离不开杯中之物，一旦碰到酒便要痛饮一番。此人注定一事无成。', 'en': "This one can't leave the bottle alone, nor put it down once they've picked it up; not really a suitable candidate – for anything!"}

title: {'zh': '披发左衽', 'en': 'Tribal Exile'}
description: {'zh': '此人被自己同胞赶出了领地，只能四处流浪，再寻良机。', 'en': 'Cast out by their own people, this one is has left their own lands by necessity as much as a sense of adventure.'}

title: {'zh': '坑蒙拐骗', 'en': 'Trickster'}
description: {'zh': '此人总是在暗中筹划些什么，千万别过于信任！', 'en': 'This person always has a hidden agenda; do not trust them any further than you can throw them!'}

title: {'zh': '久历四方', 'en': 'Wanderer'}
description: {'zh': '“我一生放荡不羁爱自由，失也好得也好，自有把握。”', 'en': '"I have walked my way since the beginning. Sometimes I give, sometimes I take – it is mine to know which and when."'}

title: {'zh': '忠直善射', 'en': 'Loyal Sharpshooter'}
description: {'zh': '心存叛逆之徒都应当睁大眼睛提防曹性……否则就有可能被他夺去这双眼！', 'en': 'Potential traitors should keep an eye out for Cao Xing... or risk losing it!'}

title: {'zh': '决讼九江', 'en': 'Magistrate'}
description: {'zh': '身居两千石之位，陈纪早已对官场风云了然于心', 'en': 'An important cog of law administration, who is no stranger to the pressures of bureaucracy.'}

title: {'zh': '程公', 'en': 'Elder Cheng'}
description: {'zh': '程普的经验与智慧让他成为孙氏军队的中流砥柱。', 'en': "Cheng Pu's experience and wisdom makes him a pillar of stability."}

title: {'zh': '刚戾务实', 'en': 'Ruthless Pragmatist'}
description: {'zh': '程昱深谙：身处战乱年代，即便最诡之道，有时亦可行之。', 'en': 'Cheng Yu knows that even the most unthinkable actions can become unavoidable in times of war.'}

title: {'zh': '嗜酒失职', 'en': 'Drunken Incompetent'}
description: {'zh': '凡淳于琼所进之言，皆可反其道而行之。', 'en': 'Whatever Chunyu Qiong suggests, do the opposite.'}

title: {'zh': '倾国倾城', 'en': 'Legendary Beauty'}
description: {'zh': '为讨貂蝉欢心，有人不惜铤而走险，有人不惜以身试法，冒天下之大不韪……', 'en': "Some men will throw themselves into terrible danger in search of Diaochan's favour, and some would consider committing the blackest of crimes…"}

title: {'zh': '陷阵先锋', 'en': 'Formation Breaker'}
description: {'zh': '敌人会溃败，高顺则不然。', 'en': 'The enemy will break. Gao Shun will not.'}

title: {'zh': '多疑恶徒', 'en': 'Paranoid Thug'}
description: {'zh': '郭汜树敌甚多，其假想的敌人甚至还更多！', 'en': 'Guo Si has many real enemies – and many more imagined ones!'}

title: {'zh': '智谋如鬼', 'en': 'Erratic Advisor'}
description: {'zh': '郭图刚强莽直，心中只生一计：进攻！', 'en': "Guo Tu's advice is always the same: attack!"}

title: {'zh': '忠勇之士', 'en': 'Loyal Mercenary'}
description: {'zh': '韩当的行事方式不拘小节，但恪尽职守、忠心耿耿。', 'en': "Han Dang's modus operandi has often been compared to that of a mercenary. His loyalty and dedication to his masters is unwavering, however."}

title: {'zh': '屯田护军', 'en': 'Feeder of Armies'}
description: {'zh': '韩浩勇猛过人，亦通农桑之务，实乃奇才！', 'en': 'A courageous warrior and an adept agriculturalist, Han Hao is a valuable asset.'}

title: {'zh': '两面三刀', 'en': 'Treacherous Rogue'}
description: {'zh': '他一有机会就会在背后捅你一刀，但在此之前，郝萌的下三滥招数往往最为实用。', 'en': "He'll stab you in the back as soon as he gets the chance, but until then Hao Meng's dirty tricks can be most useful."}

title: {'zh': '以力服人', 'en': 'Blunt Instrument'}
description: {'zh': '纪灵认为绝大多数问题都可以单凭蛮力解决。', 'en': 'Ji Ling believes most problems can be solved through the overwhelming application of brute force.'}

title: {'zh': '澄思寂虑', 'en': 'Voice of Reason'}
description: {'zh': '沮授深知：欲速则不达。', 'en': 'Ju Shou knows the risks of haste and the value of patience.'}

title: {'zh': '谦卑巾帼', 'en': 'Humble Matriarch'}
description: {'zh': '曹氏家族是一群倔强之人，需要耐心和智慧才能管理好他们。', 'en': 'It takes patience and wisdom to manage the fractious brood that is the Cao family.'}

title: {'zh': '果决刚烈', 'en': 'Steadfast Loyalist'}
description: {'zh': '糜夫人为保护亲眷，会不惜牺牲性命。', 'en': 'Lady Mi will do anything to protect her family – even if it means sacrificing herself.'}

title: {'zh': '邪佞狂徒', 'en': 'Vicious Strongman'}
description: {'zh': '李傕认为战争不过是朝堂之争通过另一种手段的延续罢了。', 'en': "In Li Jue's view, politics is just the continuation of war by other means."}

title: {'zh': '梦梅居士', 'en': 'Mengmei Householder'}
description: {'zh': '娄子伯献寒天筑垒之策，却不以为功', 'en': 'Lou Gui will summon fortifications from the air itself,  but he expects to be rewarded…'}

title: {'zh': '飞将之女', 'en': 'Daughter of the Dragon'}
description: {'zh': '有话道有其父必有其女。吕布之女虽姿容艳丽，却危险致命，真可谓巾帼不让须眉。', 'en': "The apple doesn't fall far from the tree. Lü Bu's daughter is as beautiful as she is deadly."}

title: {'zh': '清公素履', 'en': 'Enforcer of Morals'}
description: {'zh': '谁能选用清廉正直之士？毛玠。', 'en': 'Who watches the watchmen? In this case, Mao Jie.'}

title: {'zh': '恶毒鬼祟', 'en': 'Vindictive Sneak'}
description: {'zh': '竞争残酷，逢纪为求上位，会不择手段，极尽其所能。', 'en': 'Ruthlessly competitive, Pang Ji will employ whatever dirty trick he can to come out on top.'}

title: {'zh': '踏实可靠', 'en': 'The Dependable'}
description: {'zh': '当众人纷纷冲昏了头脑，审配却能继续保持清醒，主持大小事务。', 'en': 'When everyone else is losing their heads, Shen Pei can be trusted to keep things going.'}

title: {'zh': '刚直智士', 'en': 'Forthright Advisor'}
description: {'zh': '田丰言之有物，可惜忠言逆耳……', 'en': "Tian Feng's advice is usually good – though it's not always what people want to hear..."}

title: {'zh': '敏锐相士', 'en': 'Astute Analyst'}
description: {'zh': '许劭善于相人，乃世所罕见。', 'en': "Few can dissect a person's character as keenly as Xu Shao."}

title: {'zh': '义侠书生', 'en': 'Reformed Vigilante'}
description: {'zh': '徐庶少好任侠击剑，尝为人报仇，历艰难得脱。于是弃其刀戟，更疏巾单衣，折节学问。得义理精熟，亦化理为兵。', 'en': 'Xu Shu once wandered the lands as a roaming swordsman - but now his mind is his sharpest weapon.'}

title: {'zh': '谋术多端', 'en': 'Inveterate Schemer'}
description: {'zh': '“我有一计……”', 'en': '"I have a cunning plan..."'}

title: {'zh': '白波将军', 'en': 'White Wave Warlord'}
description: {'zh': '白波将军审时度势，总是选择最有利可图的盟友。', 'en': 'The White Wave warlord reads the tides of time, and his allegiances always lie with those most beneficial to him.'}

title: {'zh': '雅望高士', 'en': 'Respected Advisor'}
description: {'zh': '“主公才略过人，当可容某献上一言……？”', 'en': '"Your wisdom is without question, but if I could but offer a suggestion…?"'}

title: {'zh': '狂直谋臣', 'en': 'Abrasive Advisor'}
description: {'zh': '心胸狭隘之人求助虞翻当多加宽心，直面其言', 'en': 'Those with sensitive egos should beware of asking advice from Yu Fan. '}

title: {'zh': '农学大家', 'en': 'Agricultural Reformer'}
description: {'zh': '只要能追求其改革大业，袁涣并不在乎侍奉于何人帐下。', 'en': 'Yuan Huan cares not whom he serves, so long as he can pursue his reformist interests.'}

title: {'zh': '失宠之子', 'en': 'Unfavoured Son'}
description: {'zh': '对袁谭而言，显赫的家世既是优势，也是负担——尤其是有着这么一位野心勃勃的父亲。', 'en': "A prestigious lineage can be both a boon and a burden – especially when your father is as ambitious as Yuan Tan's."}

title: {'zh': '狡诈多端', 'en': 'Crafty Operator'}
description: {'zh': '乱世浮沉为阶梯，臧霸足以任先登！', 'en': 'Chaos is a ladder, and one Zang Ba is well equipped to climb.'}

title: {'zh': '首倡屯田', 'en': 'Father of the Tuntian'}
description: {'zh': '枣祗深知：国之根基，水土万民', 'en': 'Zao Zhi knows that all kingdoms are founded upon two things: the people and the land.'}

title: {'zh': '卑鄙狡狯', 'en': 'Populist Rogue'}
description: {'zh': '笮融表面上劫富济贫，实际上却私吞财物，中饱私囊。', 'en': 'Ze Rong steals from the rich to feed the poor. And himself. Mostly himself.'}

title: {'zh': '黑山少主', 'en': 'Prince of Black Mountain'}
description: {'zh': '飞燕之子，不逊乃父。', 'en': "The son of the 'Flying Swallow' is no less of a man than his father."}

title: {'zh': '文理意正', 'en': 'Adept Diplomat'}
description: {'zh': '机智敏捷，举止镇定，张纮在不同宫廷之间游刃有余。', 'en': 'With a quick wit and unflappable demeanour, Zhang Hong moves between courts with consummate ease.'}

title: {'zh': '八面玲珑', 'en': 'Friend to All'}
description: {'zh': '张邈虽好广交豪杰，然其友多水火不容。', 'en': "Zhang Miao has friends everywhere. It's a shame they all hate each other."}

title: {'zh': '能屈能伸', 'en': 'Reed in the Wind'}
description: {'zh': '张绣有灵活应变之才，是局势大好之蜜，亦是局势变化之毒，当局势有变，且多加留心......', 'en': "Zhang Xiu's flexibility is an asset when times a good, but keep an eye on him if the tables turn…"}

title: {'zh': '忠謇方直', 'en': 'Stern Advisor'}
description: {'zh': '即便是最强大的雄主，偶尔也需要臣属直言劝诫。张昭就是这样一位勇于谏言，值得信赖之人。', 'en': 'Even the mightiest warlords need a sharp rebuke from time to time. Zhang Zhao can be relied upon to provide it. '}

title: {'zh': '肤如刻画', 'en': 'Man of Many Scars'}
description: {'zh': '战如熊虎，不惜躯命，被创数十，肤如刻画', 'en': 'His scar-riddled skin is a canvas of stories, telling of countless bloody battles past.'}

title: {'zh': '新授虎符', 'en': 'Novice Commander'}
description: {'zh': '尽管志存高远，急于一展所长，但此人总归只是个战场白丁。', 'en': 'Although eager to show their prowess, this general is nevertheless relatively new to war.'}

title: {'zh': '指挥若定', 'en': 'Capable Commander'}
description: {'zh': '此人虽尚需磨砺雕琢，但已有资格在战场上博取功名。', 'en': 'Although they have much yet to learn, this commander has begun to earn their scars in battle.'}

title: {'zh': '卓越统帅', 'en': 'Adept Commander'}
description: {'zh': '世上可还有此人未曾通晓的军务及战法？屈指可数。', 'en': 'What is there to know of war that this one does not already know? Very little, it seems!'}

title: {'zh': '初入官场', 'en': 'Fledgling Administrator'}
description: {'zh': '治民当知百业，识生计，此人不过初窥门径而已。', 'en': 'To govern is to know many things, and this one knows only the basics, so far.'}

title: {'zh': '肱股之臣', 'en': 'Competent Administrator'}
description: {'zh': '此人对吏治已颇有心得，假以时日，必将成为朝廷的肱股之臣。', 'en': 'Given time and investment, they will become a most capable leader. They are already on their way.'}

title: {'zh': '王佐之才', 'en': 'Seasoned Administrator'}
description: {'zh': '城池如绢，政令若笔，绘出丰年人乐业的曼妙画卷。', 'en': 'If governance is an art, then the city is a canvas, and this one a true painter.'}

title: {'zh': '新任小吏', 'en': 'Beginner Coinmaster'}
description: {'zh': '处事或许拙手拙脚，但并不缺乏精明鉴识之能。', 'en': 'They may fumble their coin more often than not, but they have a budding eye for value and prudence.'}

title: {'zh': '精明吏曹', 'en': 'Versed Coinmaster'}
description: {'zh': '户部不计无用之数，亦不纳无用之人。', 'en': "The counting of coin is no fool's errand, and it is certain that this one is no fool."}

title: {'zh': '丰财尚书', 'en': 'Scrupulous Coinmaster'}
description: {'zh': '可使之掌支计、主财帛。', 'en': 'The master of all they survey, and they mostly survey money.'}

title: {'zh': '新进驯师', 'en': 'Fresh Tamer'}
description: {'zh': '徒有爱惜之情，然则对驯兽之术一窍不通。', 'en': 'Whilst this one has a love for animals, they are thoroughly unversed in their ways.'}

title: {'zh': '精英驯师', 'en': 'Professional Tamer'}
description: {'zh': '鞭打并非唯一令野兽臣服之术。', 'en': 'A whipcrack is no longer required to bring these beasts to heel.'}

title: {'zh': '剽悍驯师', 'en': 'Fearsome Tamer'}
description: {'zh': '只待主人挥鞭怒喝，猛兽顷刻纵入战场。', 'en': "The crack of the whip and the cry of battle sends beasts to war at their master's command."}

title: {'zh': '天赋小将', 'en': 'Amateur General'}
description: {'zh': '虽沙场初试，已初现峥嵘，此子建功立业，指日可待……', 'en': 'This one tries at war, but has yet to find much success. Give it time, however…'}

title: {'zh': '沙场宿将', 'en': 'Professional General'}
description: {'zh': '此人战法已熟稔于心，信手拈来。 ', 'en': 'War is to them as breathing is to others; natural and necessary. '}

title: {'zh': '铁血悍将', 'en': 'Brutal General'}
description: {'zh': '无论何种骇人之事，危机之局，在此人看来皆为寻常。', 'en': "That which others would call horrendous, is but a day's work to this general."}

title: {'zh': '入伍新丁', 'en': 'Newcomer Warrior'}
description: {'zh': '有心而无力，有胆而无技，日夜操练，方能兼而得之。', 'en': 'Eager and skilled are not common aquaintances. Yet in time, the two can become the same.'}

title: {'zh': '勇武过人', 'en': 'Skilled Warrior'}
description: {'zh': '兵刃在手，如臂使指。', 'en': 'You put a weapon in their hand, they will use it, and use it well.'}

title: {'zh': '冠绝三军', 'en': 'Extraordinary Warrior'}
description: {'zh': '此人之战技已臻化境，敌虽众，可使无斗。', 'en': 'One fighter after another lines up to be felled by their superior, transcendental skill.'}

title: {'zh': '阴毒之士', 'en': 'Sneaky Chief'}
description: {'zh': '始于不足道的欺瞒与遁词，却如燎原野火般蔓延……', 'en': 'Subterfuge and deception begin in the most basic of acts, then rage like fire…'}

title: {'zh': '诡计多端', 'en': 'Cunning Chief'}
description: {'zh': '切不可尽信其言，恐有欺瞒……', 'en': 'Beware their words, for they do not always carry the meaning you would wish…'}

title: {'zh': '口蜜腹剑 ', 'en': 'Insidious Chief '}
description: {'zh': '阳与之善，啖以甘言，而阴陷之。', 'en': 'Their ways drip sweet like honey, yet conceal the poison blade amongst the saccharine talk.'}

title: {'zh': '未有建树', 'en': 'Untested Official'}
description: {'zh': '虽身居施政之职，尚不识治民之法。', 'en': 'Although ready to govern, there is a world of knowledge they yet need to know.'}

title: {'zh': '乐善好施', 'en': 'Accommodating Official'}
description: {'zh': '宽以恤民，政致康乂。', 'en': 'If it is within their power, they will do it, for the benefit of the people.'}

title: {'zh': '宽仁官吏', 'en': 'Magnanimous Official'}
description: {'zh': '心存善念的掌权之人方能泽后人之惠，惟愿其恶念不生，恶缘不兴……', 'en': 'Those with both power and good intent can do wonderful things should they succeed in keeping evil thoughts at bay...'}

title: {'zh': '精打细算', 'en': 'Thrifty Leader'}
description: {'zh': '常言道，俭能留财。', 'en': 'A coin not spent is a coin saved, they always say.'}

title: {'zh': '机敏领袖', 'en': 'Resourceful Leader'}
description: {'zh': '能白手起家，从无到有，或许是身为父母官最珍贵的才能。', 'en': 'It is known that as a leader, a valuable skill is conjuring something from nothing.'}

title: {'zh': '物阜民熙', 'en': 'Providing Leader'}
description: {'zh': '所得之尽皆用之于民，此之谓爱民如子。', 'en': 'What can be sourced by this leader is then shared with their people; that is true leadership.'}

title: {'zh': '政令生疏', 'en': 'Untried Bureaucrat'}
description: {'zh': '知之为知之，然则知之并非治之。', 'en': 'The ways of governance are known to them, in theory. In practice, however…'}

title: {'zh': '行之有法', 'en': 'Practiced Bureaucrat'}
description: {'zh': '时间与经验将初入官署的愣头青熬成了能吏。', 'en': 'Time and experience have turned this once-green would-be into a skilled manager of affairs.'}

title: {'zh': '经世之材', 'en': 'Economical Bureaucrat'}
description: {'zh': '精明的眼光与敏锐的洞察成就经世治国之才。', 'en': 'A shrewd, keen eye lends itself well to the business of governing, and managing economic interests.'}

title: {'zh': '乡间理事', 'en': 'Basic Steward'}
description: {'zh': '此人虽无赫赫之功，却也尽力令治下百姓安居乐业。', 'en': 'To maintain the household. That is their job. Nothing more.'}

title: {'zh': '处置有方', 'en': 'Experienced Steward'}
description: {'zh': '官场经验日丰，治民之职亦日重。', 'en': 'As a steward gains in experience, so too do their responsibilities over the estate they manage.'}

title: {'zh': '国之栋梁', 'en': 'Veteran Steward'}
description: {'zh': '国之重臣当以一己之身侍奉国是，代天子稳江山，安社稷。', 'en': "Such is the steward's skill, that they essentially own the estate in lieu of the true lord of the land."}

title: {'zh': '初掌事务 ', 'en': 'Novice Chieftain '}
description: {'zh': '孔子曰：道之以德。奈何此人行事并无章法。', 'en': 'To be chieftain is to command respect, and this chief... barely does.'}

title: {'zh': '英明酋首', 'en': 'Skilled Chieftain'}
description: {'zh': '天道酬勤，此人成为一族之长绝非受他人恩惠或运气使然。', 'en': 'This chieftain has endured not through luck or favour, but a skill all their own.'}

title: {'zh': '威慑四方', 'en': 'Powerful Chieftain'}
description: {'zh': '真正的酋长可力拔山河，威不可测，部民皆数拜伏。', 'en': 'Strength defines a true chief, and strength also defines this one.'}

title: {'zh': '寻常守将', 'en': 'Basic Bastion'}
description: {'zh': '惜乎，守军志气虽立，然御敌工事不坚。', 'en': 'The will to protect is often far stronger than the actual ability to do so.'}

title: {'zh': '守若铁壁', 'en': 'Resilient Bastion'}
description: {'zh': '沙场磨砺，战火淬炼。此人已熟稔虚实兼用，防守御敌游刃有余。', 'en': 'Time, effort, and many battles, has made this one a resilient wall against foes.'}

title: {'zh': '稳若泰山', 'en': 'Expert Bastion '}
description: {'zh': '坚定不移，寸土不让。', 'en': 'They move for no-one.'}

title: {'zh': '羽翼未丰', 'en': 'Initiate Commander'}
description: {'zh': '此子首次领兵，不当大任。不过略识兵法尔，毛羽不丰。', 'en': 'They have a smattering of elemental strategy, but no more.'}

title: {'zh': '足智多谋', 'en': 'Guileful Commander'}
description: {'zh': '审时度势、戒骄戒躁、越挫越勇，方知何为战。', 'en': 'Study and patience, and more than a few defeats, have given this commander a greater knowledge of war.'}

title: {'zh': '挥斥方遒', 'en': 'Artful Commander'}
description: {'zh': '此人堪当今世统帅之楷模。', 'en': 'They are the very model of a modern major general.'}

title: {'zh': '血性领袖', 'en': 'Eager Leader'}
description: {'zh': '未经战阵，技艺不精，惟以一腔热血补之。', 'en': 'What they lack in quantifiable experience they make up for with sheer enthusiasm.'}

title: {'zh': '果决坚定', 'en': 'Resolute Leader'}
description: {'zh': '其志之坚，坚如磐石，无可撼动。', 'en': 'Once their mind is made up, it can be staggeringly difficult to alter their course.'}

title: {'zh': '总揽大局', 'en': 'Masterful Leader'}
description: {'zh': '战场亦如商场，任凭其统筹谋划。', 'en': 'War is their business, and business – it seems – is good.'}

title: {'zh': '初入官场', 'en': 'Apprentice Executive'}
description: {'zh': '此子犹须勤学，若是悉心栽培，花费些光景，可成大器。', 'en': 'They have much to learn. But with an abundance of time – and the right tutelage – they could be a contender for greatness.'}

title: {'zh': '老成公吏', 'en': 'Tested Executive'}
description: {'zh': '世人只夸其知人善用，却不知其为辨材增损之岁月。', 'en': 'To manage people is to know people. And to know people is the work of many hard years.'}

title: {'zh': '治世循吏', 'en': 'Superior Executive'}
description: {'zh': '需得奋身独步，方能成为非常之人。或慷慨解囊，或杀人如麻，皆为登顶之途。', 'en': 'They have come far because they worked at it, being generous where they could, and ruthless when they needed to be.'}

title: {'zh': '鲁莽冒进', 'en': 'Reckless Vanguard'}
description: {'zh': '此人擅以战意补足战技之缺，然则其战技亦不可小觑。', 'en': 'If they lack anything in skill – and it is not to say they do – then it is compensated greatly by pure verve.'}

title: {'zh': '斗志昂扬', 'en': 'Energetic Vanguard'}
description: {'zh': '经年累月的杀戮早已将怜悯之心冲刷殆尽。冲锋陷阵时，唯有蛮狠与无情的怒火如影随形。', 'en': "Years of war have worn this one's mercy down to all but nothing – brutal, unrelenting fury follows their charge."}

title: {'zh': '冷酷先锋', 'en': 'Ruthless Vanguard'}
description: {'zh': '此生为战尔，力战而亡，死得其所！', 'en': 'The fight is all that matters – if their life is to be forfeit, so be it!'}

title: {'zh': '纸上谈兵', 'en': 'Untried Strategist'}
description: {'zh': '初出茅庐的谋士，战前纸上谈兵，阵中方寸大乱。', 'en': ' They understand what they can, but falter in situations beyond that which they have studied.'}

title: {'zh': '深谋远虑', 'en': 'Prepared Strategist'}
description: {'zh': '战争的残酷磨砺出其不曾有的锋芒。', 'en': 'The reality of war has given them an edge that hitherto they were lacking.'}

title: {'zh': '铁血军将', 'en': 'Merciless Strategist'}
description: {'zh': '若由其谋划军势，则众将士不过傀儡棋子，随时沦为弃子。', 'en': 'The framework of war is theirs to command now, and they manipulate with callous disregard for the cost.'}

title: {'zh': '初临战阵', 'en': 'Novice Captain'}
description: {'zh': '战场便是血勇之人和沙场老兵的舞台。然而，谁人都有初次亮相的时候。', 'en': 'War is the business of the blooded and tested, but they all have to start somewhere.'}

title: {'zh': '兵贵神速', 'en': 'Efficient Captain'}
description: {'zh': '气魄不显，刚猛不足，亦难掩其破敌之神速。', 'en': "Some may say this captain lacks a certain flair and bloody streak, but nobody says they don't get the job done quickly."}

title: {'zh': '悍勇无双', 'en': 'Unmatched Captain'}
description: {'zh': '这员猛将一身本领出神入化，游走战场之间，竟是无人能敌。', 'en': 'Nobody has a greater skill and speed for the business of battle than this one.'}

title: {'zh': '未经刀兵', 'en': 'Unbloodied Fighter'}
description: {'zh': '空有求战之志，却不曾见识刀兵之残忍……', 'en': 'One can have the desire to fight, in theory, but have very little understanding of what it actually entails…'}

title: {'zh': '久经战阵', 'en': 'Enduring Fighter'}
description: {'zh': '久经战阵之人早已深谙持久之道，鏖战不止，乃至超越极限。', 'en': 'What marks this one apart from the others is their ability to continue fighting, long after it is reasonable to stop.'}

title: {'zh': '疆场虎将', 'en': 'Redoubtable Fighter'}
description: {'zh': '此将宛若一尊杀神，兵刃高举，将恐惧与怯懦刻入敌军心底。', 'en': 'To see them on the battlefield, weapons drawn, is to inspire fear and retreat in the heart of any who face them.'}

title: {'zh': '空有雄心', 'en': 'Naively Ambitious'}
description: {'zh': '此人眼中空有权力，却不知掌权之道。', 'en': 'This one sees only power, and never the way to it.'}

title: {'zh': '铮骨谋臣', 'en': 'Unbiased Advisor'}
description: {'zh': '此人秉持公允之道，虽致主公愠怒仍能铮铮直言。', 'en': 'This advisor will always speak objectively, even if it draws the ire of the powerful.'}

title: {'zh': '即鹿无虞', 'en': 'Rash Judge'}
description: {'zh': '决断必当审慎客观，但……', 'en': 'Judgement should never be swift or subjective; and yet…'}

title: {'zh': '士家忠良', 'en': 'Faithful of Shi'}
description: {'zh': '对大业须全情投入，否则与叛主无异。', 'en': 'There must be only total devotion to the cause; anything less is as good as treason.'}

title: {'zh': '非长非幼', 'en': 'The Middle Child'}
description: {'zh': '夹在长兄与幼弟之间，是否比死还难受？', 'en': 'To be stuck between the oldest and the youngest – a fate worse than death?'}

title: {'zh': '传道布训', 'en': 'Preacher'}
description: {'zh': '此人笃信其道，四处传布，纵使道外之人，亦为之心动', 'en': 'A zealously made point, delivered with wild-eyed conviction, can inspire and incite even the staunchest non-believer.'}

title: {'zh': '避实击虚', 'en': 'Guerrilla'}
description: {'zh': '「贼军虽数倍于我，若出奇兵，必能制胜！」', 'en': '"We might be vastly outnumbered, but never underestimate the element of surprise!"'}

title: {'zh': '府中耳目', 'en': 'Agent'}
description: {'zh': '“我有使命在身，成事与否关乎我的荣誉。让开吧。”', 'en': '"I am charged with a duty that I am honour-bound to prosecute. Stand aside."'}

title: {'zh': '操纵自如', 'en': 'Manipulator'}
description: {'zh': '此人隐于幕后操纵一切，精通阴谋诡计', 'en': 'Always working behind the scenes, this individual is a master of intrigue.'}

title: {'zh': '当地豪杰', 'en': 'Local Hero'}
description: {'zh': '不是所有的英雄都会穿铠甲，不过有些还是会穿的。', 'en': 'Not all heroes wear armour. But some, also, do.'}

title: {'zh': '亲遣质任', 'en': 'Outsider'}
description: {'zh': '此人虽被对方家族接纳，但仍如涸辙之鲋', 'en': 'Accepted by their surrogate family, but nevertheless still a fish out of water.'}

title: {'zh': '激昂慷慨', 'en': 'Militant'}
description: {'zh': '刀兵将至，备者先行', 'en': 'When war comes, those who stay ready are first to be called.'}

title: {'zh': '研桑心计', 'en': 'Trader'}
description: {'zh': '此人行商长袖善舞，颇有端木遗风', 'en': 'People-skills, coupled to an aptitude for business, make this one a crafty merchant indeed.'}

title: {'zh': '奇谋百出', 'en': 'Advisor'}
description: {'zh': '谗言乃大敌，知己乃挚友', 'en': 'There is no worse enemy than bad advice, and few better friends than a wise confidant.'}

title: {'zh': '一乡之长', 'en': 'Village Chief'}
description: {'zh': '此人坚贞自信，可治一村', 'en': 'To lead a community takes confidence, focus and integrity, which this one has in abundance.'}

title: {'zh': '决胜千里', 'en': 'Officer'}
description: {'zh': '虎将治军，匹夫亦可战；匹夫为帅，虎将不能行', 'en': 'It is better to have an army of donkeys led by a tiger, than an army of tigers led by a donkey.'}

title: {'zh': '勇冠三军', 'en': 'Warrior'}
description: {'zh': '氓隶之辈亦可奋兵而战，然凛然向死者，真勇士也', 'en': 'Any simpleton can wield a weapon and fight, but a resolute acceptance of death marks out the true warrior.'}

title: {'zh': '坚守不屈', 'en': 'Guard'}
description: {'zh': '此人刚毅坚强，尽忠职守', 'en': 'A stalwart protector, they never fall asleep at their post.'}

title: {'zh': '运筹帷幄', 'en': 'Tactician'}
description: {'zh': '每逢战事，此人必先行侦查，免遭敌军破袭之苦', 'en': 'When it comes to strategy and battlefield manoeuvres, the devil is very much in the detail.'}

title: {'zh': '百战民兵', 'en': 'Militia Veteran'}
description: {'zh': '「十五从军征，八十始得归...」兵老知多，战多识广；欲问兵戈，此为良师。', 'en': 'This veteran has seen it all, done it all, and he will almost certainly tell you about it, given the chance.'}

title: {'zh': '泰平卫士', 'en': 'Peacekeeper'}
description: {'zh': '不惜一切，捍卫和平', 'en': 'Conflict must be prevented by any means necessary.'}

title: {'zh': '鹰犬耳目', 'en': 'Inspector'}
description: {'zh': '此人见微知著，任上总能明察秋毫', 'en': 'Paying close attention to detail, this one is always aware of the goings-on in their jurisdiction.'}

title: {'zh': '主簿佐吏', 'en': 'Clerk'}
description: {'zh': '勤学苦练，方可字句无遗', 'en': 'An expert notary, they know that effective record-keeping is only achieved through stubborn diligence.'}

title: {'zh': '饱学多才', 'en': 'Academic'}
description: {'zh': '此人孜孜不倦，深晓经论', 'en': 'This one sees the value of institutionalised learning, and has embraced it.'}

title: {'zh': '躬耕田野', 'en': 'Farmer'}
description: {'zh': '「血汗厩肥，耕稼之苦」', 'en': '"This is what real hard work smells like – blood, sweat and animal faeces."'}

title: {'zh': '明镜高悬', 'en': 'Magistrate'}
description: {'zh': '此人以法而治，宫府之事自是手到擒来', 'en': 'An important cog of law administration, who is no stranger to the pressures of bureaucracy.'}

title: {'zh': '通同结党', 'en': 'Partisan'}
description: {'zh': '此人信念笃定，处事甚是偏执', 'en': 'Always led by conviction, this one exhibits clear bias in their opinions.'}

title: {'zh': '裒刻征敛', 'en': 'Tax Collector'}
description: {'zh': '税吏征敛，民以为害，实乃不得不行之事', 'en': 'Tax collection is a necessary evil, as are its instruments.'}

title: {'zh': '无所偏私', 'en': 'Mediator'}
description: {'zh': '敌军纵使趁夜来袭，此人亦可观而察之', 'en': 'This person knows how to divide the cake in such a way that everyone believes they have the biggest slice.'}

title: {'zh': '勤孝虔恭', 'en': 'Filial & Pious'}
description: {'zh': '「夫孝，德之本也，教之所由生也」', 'en': '"Respect for parents, elders, and ancestors is the root of all virtue, the stem from which all moral teachings grow."'}

title: {'zh': '明侦密访', 'en': 'Scout'}
description: {'zh': '每逢战事，此人必先行侦查，免遭敌军破袭之苦', 'en': 'Ranging forward, this general guards the troops against threats from without.'}

title: {'zh': '弯弓纵猎', 'en': 'Hunter'}
description: {'zh': '控弦破左的，右发摧月支', 'en': 'Expert with the bow, they are able to strike their quarry from quite a distance.'}

title: {'zh': '严行警哨', 'en': 'Lookout'}
description: {'zh': '敌军纵使趁夜来袭，此人亦可观而察之', 'en': 'Keen eyesight enables this person to spot the enemy clearly, even under cover of night.'}

title: {'zh': '学富五车', 'en': 'Savant'}
description: {'zh': '此人才华惊世骇俗，古今无两。', 'en': 'A most prodigious talent, beyond anything anyone has ever seen.'}

title: {'zh': '劳工出身', 'en': 'Labourer'}
description: {'zh': '辛勤己事，便利万家。世事循环皆是如此。', 'en': "They toil so that others don't have to, presumably. It is the order of things."}

title: {'zh': '舟师纵横', 'en': 'Competent Sailor'}
description: {'zh': '蔡瑁善水战，乃水中幼蛟，前途可期。', 'en': 'Cai Mao is adept of naval combat, and a budding admiral.'}

title: {'zh': '丰愍王', 'en': 'Prince Min'}
description: {'zh': '生当为长兄，死亦为英烈。', 'en': 'Cao Ang’s fate is to one day be prince of the House of Cao, be it in life or in death.'}

title: {'zh': '乱世奸雄', 'en': 'Strategic Mastermind'}
description: {'zh': '曹操狡谲，乘他人鹬蚌相持之际从中渔利', 'en': 'The wily Cao Cao sees opportunity in the hardships of others, skewing things to his advantage.'}

title: {'zh': '庙堂龙犬', 'en': 'Political Animal'}
description: {'zh': '「疆场之上，一死而已；宫府之间，千生不足」', 'en': '"In war, you can only be killed once, but in politics, many times."'}

title: {'zh': '弓马弋猎', 'en': 'Brave Hunter'}
description: {'zh': '曹仁少好弓马弋猎，智勇无畏，堪称将才', 'en': 'The skills of a fearless outdoorsman – horse-riding, archery, and hunting – make Cao Ren a valued battlefield ally.'}

title: {'zh': '有智而迟', 'en': 'Master Magistrate'}
description: {'zh': '陈宫有智而迟，大义持而后彰', 'en': 'Chen Gong knows that even great men are imperfect, and righteousness is often not immediately obvious.'}

title: {'zh': '荡寇将军', 'en': 'Bandit Killer'}
description: {'zh': '荡寇将军自负胆气，平扫万难', 'en': "The General of the Household Who Defeats Bandits' is living proof that bravery can overcome adversity."}

title: {'zh': '古之恶来', 'en': 'Brute of Unmatched Power'}
description: {'zh': '「真乃古之恶来也！」', 'en': '"Such prowess! This is old Elai again!"'}

title: {'zh': '狼戾贼忍', 'en': 'Cruel Tyrant'}
description: {'zh': '董卓欺君弄权，贪得无厌', 'en': "Consumed by his hunger for power, Dong Zhuo's despotism knows no bounds."}

title: {'zh': '睚眦必报', 'en': 'Vindictive Strategist'}
description: {'zh': '法正虽睚眦而必报，勿相为怨，免遭毁伤', 'en': 'The intelligent and vengeful Fa Zheng should not be crossed, lest you become the target of his deadly schemes.'}

title: {'zh': '锦帆游侠', 'en': 'Pirate of the Bells'}
description: {'zh': '「孟德有张辽，孤有兴霸，足相敌也！」', 'en': '"Cao Cao may have Zhang Liao, but I have Gan Ning! Thus we are evenly matched."'}

title: {'zh': '精通史学', 'en': 'Master Historian'}
description: {'zh': '“以史为鉴，莫重蹈覆辙。”', 'en': '"There are lessons in the past; if we do not learn them, we are doomed"'}

title: {'zh': '才志弘邈', 'en': 'Loyal Nephew'}
description: {'zh': '高干虽曾虎踞一时，然其忠心始终未泯', 'en': 'Ever the rebel, Gao Gan’s true allegiances shall only die when he does.'}

title: {'zh': '地统之才', 'en': 'Master of the Land'}
description: {'zh': '龚都绝非残虐匪类，而是有志善战之士', 'en': 'Far from being just a heartless bandit, Gong Du is a principled soldier of honour.'}

title: {'zh': '残暴不节', 'en': 'the Warlike'}
description: {'zh': '公孙度喋血乱战，为祸一方', 'en': 'In war, Gongsun Du does what is required of him; he revels in bloodshed and conquest.'}

title: {'zh': '骁勇战将', 'en': 'Brave General'}
description: {'zh': '公孙续既知谋略，又有勇武，为守护边疆甘愿赴汤蹈火。', 'en': 'Gongsun Xu combines the tactical mind of a strategist, with the bravery and duty of a man who has risked his life on the frontlines countless times.'}

title: {'zh': '铁腕将军', 'en': 'The Iron Fist General'}
description: {'zh': '镇守北疆，需控弦带甲，亦需风雷铁腕', 'en': 'Defence of the frontiers requires more than just the resources of a warlord, but also a merciless attitude.'}

title: {'zh': '审时度势', 'en': 'Cautious Strategist'}
description: {'zh': '关靖谨慎非常，因而常被误认为懦夫，但实则是审慎明察之人。', 'en': "Guan Jing's caution may sometimes be confused for cowardice, but its true source is observation."}

title: {'zh': '武圣', 'en': 'God of War'}
description: {'zh': '云长威震华夏，敢乱其大义者必斩之，真武圣也', 'en': 'A famed warrior and righteous slayer of all who dare oppose him, Guan Yu’s deification is already assured.'}

title: {'zh': '鬼谋', 'en': 'Astute Advisor'}
description: {'zh': '郭嘉高识远见，不听其言必致败亡', 'en': 'Guo Jia is a confidant of unparalleled foresight – to ignore his counsel is to invite failure and defeat.'}

title: {'zh': '劝课农桑', 'en': 'Diligent Agriculturalist'}
description: {'zh': '韩馥劝农营田，乃使粮草运赴略无差池', 'en': 'Using his ability to manage food supplies with tireless efficiency, Han Fu is a most valuable logistician.'}

title: {'zh': '反复无常', 'en': 'Tireless Insurgent'}
description: {'zh': '韩遂跋扈经年，岂可屈居人下', 'en': 'Insurrection is in Han Sui’s blood. To him, subservience cannot be permanent.'}

title: {'zh': '截天夜叉', 'en': 'The Most Powerful'}
description: {'zh': '「我乃截天夜叉何曼也！谁敢与我厮斗？」', 'en': '"I am He Man, the devil who shoots across the sky! Who dares challenge me?"'}

title: {'zh': '人统之才', 'en': 'Leader of the People'}
description: {'zh': '何仪执心坚住，劝服众人皈信正道', 'en': 'With unwavering faith, He Yi inspires others to follow in his righteous footsteps.'}

title: {'zh': '熊罴之将', 'en': 'Fierce Beast'}
description: {'zh': '华雄身长九尺，虎体狼腰，豹头猿臂，真乃一介猛士', 'en': 'With a head shaped like a leopard’s and ape-like shoulders, Hua Xiong’s ferocity is matched by his appearance.'}

title: {'zh': '姿貌严毅', 'en': 'Unreadable Warrior'}
description: {'zh': '黄盖姿貌严毅，内心则忠贞无比', 'en': 'His outward demeanour belies his real allegiances – Huang Gai truly is the very definition of inscrutability.'}

title: {'zh': '天统之才', 'en': 'Wielder of the Heavenly Way'}
description: {'zh': '欲举大义，若无渠帅则逢战必败', 'en': 'All uprisings, no matter how widespread, stand little chance of success without strong leadership.'}

title: {'zh': '廉颇之志', 'en': 'of the Ageless Strength'}
description: {'zh': '黄忠苍头似雪，犹显英雄，春秋于其何加焉？', 'en': 'The venerable Huang Zhong, to whom age is just a number, is frequently underestimated in battle.'}

title: {'zh': '暗伏弓弩', 'en': 'Ranged Ambusher'}
description: {'zh': '黄祖最善百步之外阴袭敌军', 'en': 'Huang Zu likes to start offensives on the front foot, from a safe distance and out of sight.'}

title: {'zh': '汉室老将', 'en': 'Aged General'}
description: {'zh': '刀兵之际，历战多者为良将', 'en': 'In the brutal business of war, there is no better teacher than experience.'}

title: {'zh': '短视守成', 'en': 'Short-sighted Peacekeeper'}
description: {'zh': '贾龙多谋而少断，但仍缺乏谨慎', 'en': 'Jia Long may dedicate much time to forethought, yet still lacks caution now and then.'}

title: {'zh': '文和乱武', 'en': 'The Blade in the Dark'}
description: {'zh': '帐中阴谋，祸乱天下', 'en': 'Decisions made in secret can have the deadliest outcomes.'}

title: {'zh': '麒麟儿', 'en': 'Budding Commander'}
description: {'zh': '姜维少年雄才，虽少历战阵，仍不失为凉州上士', 'en': 'Known for being an expert general despite his inexperience, Jiang Wei has a precocious talent for war.'}

title: {'zh': '五经传人', 'en': 'Master Scholar'}
description: {'zh': '孔融博闻强记，奇逸卓荦，无愧圣人苗裔', 'en': 'Kong Rong claims descent from the great Confucius himself, attested to by his remarkable wit and scholarly fame.'}

title: {'zh': '坐而论道', 'en': 'Pure Conversationalist'}
description: {'zh': '孔伷清谈高论，嘘枯吹生，以此为修身之道', 'en': 'A master at the art of Qingtan, Kong Zhou utilises discussion and debate as a means of intellectual self-improvement.'}

title: {'zh': '枭姬', 'en': 'The Rising Sun'}
description: {'zh': '正如旭日必将东升，孙仁也必将致力所愿', 'en': 'As surely as the sun rises, the Lady will always endeavour to get her way.'}

title: {'zh': '飘摇佳人', 'en': 'Elegant Survivor'}
description: {'zh': '在敌对派系之间生存，已是如履薄冰。而能受双方爱慕，则可说是丰功伟绩。', 'en': 'To step between warring factions is quite the task. To be loved by both? Quite the accomplishment.'}

title: {'zh': '隐秘之主', 'en': 'Keeper of Secrets'}
description: {'zh': '李含善晓情资，其博学多识莫有不闻，然其所知之事实惹杀身之祸', 'en': 'Li Han draws information to himself; so well-regarded is his knowledge that he often fears his life is jeopardised by what he knows.'}

title: {'zh': '暗施毒计', 'en': 'Vicious Shadow'}
description: {'zh': '群凶祸国，必仗毒计', 'en': 'Behind every despot’s schemes is the intellect of a consummate strategist.'}

title: {'zh': '果敢义士', 'en': 'Daring Errant'}
description: {'zh': '或鹰扬于沙场之上，或寻乐于战阵之间', 'en': 'For some men, war is a chance to prove one’s self and seek adventure.'}

title: {'zh': '仁德之君', 'en': 'Virtuous Idealist'}
description: {'zh': '刘备世系虽难稽考，却是中山靖王之后，孝景皇帝玄孙', 'en': 'Despite having come from modest beginnings, the blood of ancient Han emperors flows through Liu Bei’s veins.'}

title: {'zh': '汉室守成', 'en': 'Gentleman of the Han'}
description: {'zh': '刘表端庄老成，刑清国兴，无愧于汉室', 'en': 'A man seldom ruffled, Liu Biao demonstrates his aristocratic pedigree through stable officiality.'}

title: {'zh': '宽厚爱民', 'en': 'Generous Attendant'}
description: {'zh': '刘岱性仁善，纵使宫廷之上刀光剑影，仍欲施善举，行仁政', 'en': 'In spite of the harsh realities of palace life, Liu Dai conducts himself according to his nature: with kindness and benevolence.'}

title: {'zh': '孝献皇帝', 'en': 'Former Emperor'}
description: {'zh': '虽不再万人之上，亦当使万民太平', 'en': 'While no longer leading their people, they still strive to bring peace to the land.'}

title: {'zh': '待机而动', 'en': 'Opportunistic Ruler'}
description: {'zh': '或观涂炭于天下，或借良机于眼前', 'en': 'Some men just want to watch the world burn, while others use the opportunities placed before them.'}

title: {'zh': '民心所向', 'en': 'Welcoming Magistrate'}
description: {'zh': '刘繇听言称善，实则秉性贞廉，栖心淡泊', 'en': 'Liu Yao appears to be a ‘yes’ man, but is nevertheless known for his staunch incorruptibility.'}

title: {'zh': '和戎互市', 'en': 'Prosperous Trader'}
description: {'zh': '刘虞广开胡市之利，民悦年登，府库充盈', 'en': 'Liu Yu’s rapport with foreigners and minorities has enabled him to amass considerable wealth from trade.'}

title: {'zh': '闭隘养力', 'en': 'Proponent of Peace'}
description: {'zh': '刘璋虽暗懦，然国富民盛，守之以恩，无所得罪也', 'en': 'A timid and suspicious noble, Liu Zhang displays a willingness to avoid war, even if that means surrender.'}

title: {'zh': '无双飞将', 'en': 'Warrior Without Equal'}
description: {'zh': '吕布有虓虎之勇，而无英奇之略，轻狡反复，唯利是视', 'en': 'With unpredictable loyalty and unsurpassed martial skill, Lü Bu is the most dangerous warrior beneath the heavens.'}

title: {'zh': '围棋名手', 'en': 'Go Master'}
description: {'zh': '围棋非唯演兵棋盘之上，弈者远见，得窥一二', 'en': 'Go is not just an abstract game of strategy – it is a measure of one’s aptitude in tactical forethought.'}

title: {'zh': '刮目相看', 'en': 'Late Scholar'}
description: {'zh': '晚成之器，识略英博，非复吴下阿蒙', 'en': 'Despite becoming literate late on in his career, Lü Meng has proved himself a most able scholar. '}

title: {'zh': '性好施与', 'en': 'Charitable Envoy'}
description: {'zh': '鲁肃家境殷实，性好施与，足以折冲樽俎，纵横捭阖', 'en': 'Ever the philanthropic diplomat, Lu Su’s affluence empowers his charitable nature.'}

title: {'zh': '出将入相', 'en': 'Scholar General'}
description: {'zh': '陆逊入则治政安民，出则整军经武', 'en': 'Equal parts brains and brawn, Lu Xun can oversee both civil and military matters.'}

title: {'zh': '锦马超', 'en': 'Most-brilliant Warrior'}
description: {'zh': '面如冠玉，眼若流星，人言「锦马超」，名不虚传！', 'en': 'With a complexion like jade and eyes like shooting stars, Ma Chao is a warrior truly brilliant in appearance.'}

title: {'zh': '阵中兄弟', 'en': 'Fraternal Warrior'}
description: {'zh': '于马岱而言，血亲宗族，重于泰山', 'en': 'There are few things more important to Ma Dai than bloodline and family.'}

title: {'zh': '镇守西陲', 'en': 'Protector of the West'}
description: {'zh': '马腾待友至诚，但他仍对汉朝之敌毫无怜悯', 'en': "Ma Teng may treat his friends well, but he remains merciless with the Han's enemies."}

title: {'zh': '可靠良吏', 'en': 'Dependable Administrator'}
description: {'zh': '时值季世，人心思乱，而糜竺独秉忠贞', 'en': 'In these interesting times of fluctuating allegiances, the steadfast loyalty of Mi Zhu can always be relied upon.'}

title: {'zh': '白马将军', 'en': 'White Horse General'}
description: {'zh': '庞德戎昭果毅，敌者必讨', 'en': 'Pang De is an unrelenting force, whose avowed enemies know they must face him sooner or later.'}

title: {'zh': '凤雏', 'en': 'Fledgling Phoenix'}
description: {'zh': '士元士元，士之魁元，起于晦暗，光于君前', 'en': "Having risen from the ashes of obscurity, the 'Crown of Learned Men' is an advisor of the highest esteem."}

title: {'zh': '忠勇先驱', 'en': 'Virtuous Outrider'}
description: {'zh': '无论率匪领兵，皆当以身作则，身先士卒', 'en': 'Whether in charge of brigands or soldiers, one must lead by example, always riding at the head of the host.'}

title: {'zh': '江东雅士', 'en': 'Southern Gentleman'}
description: {'zh': '“若无大才，那就好生呆着吧。”', 'en': '"If you can\'t run with the big dogs, stay beneath your rock"'}

title: {'zh': '珠江之卫', 'en': 'Warden of the Pearl River'}
description: {'zh': '“我等镇守此地多年，敌若来犯，必诛之！”', 'en': '"We have long observed these lands, and our enemies challenge us at their peril!"'}

title: {'zh': '士府君', 'en': 'Governor Shi'}
description: {'zh': '士燮学问优博，达于从政，雄长一州，威尊无上', 'en': 'With his long and distinguished record of sophisticated service, Shi Xie is destined for stately eminence.'}

title: {'zh': '偏安太守', 'en': 'Complacent Administrator'}
description: {'zh': '“我不畸轻畸重。”', 'en': '"I have no strong feelings one way or the other."'}

title: {'zh': '鹰视狼顾', 'en': 'Silver Eminence'}
description: {'zh': '「能战则战，不战则守，不守则走。余者，唯降与死尔！」', 'en': '"If you cannot fight, defend. If you cannot defend, flee. If you cannot flee, surrender. If you cannot surrender, die!"'}

title: {'zh': '小霸王', 'en': 'The Little Conqueror'}
description: {'zh': '众人皆呼孙策为小霸王，此人少年统军，将才非凡', 'en': 'Sun Ce has been likened to the warrior-kings of old, with an aptitude for military leadership that belies his youth.'}

title: {'zh': '江东之虎', 'en': 'Tiger of Jiangdong'}
description: {'zh': '孙坚盖孙武之后，韬略勇武，不输先祖', 'en': 'Claiming ancestry with the renowned military strategist Sun Tzu, the fearless Sun Jian has war flowing through his veins.'}

title: {'zh': '无比忠心', 'en': 'Upstanding Loyalist'}
description: {'zh': '孙乾一诺，五岳为轻', 'en': 'Sun Qian’s word is an unwavering bond.'}

title: {'zh': '碧眼儿', 'en': 'Emerald-eyed Administrator'}
description: {'zh': '孙权形貌奇伟，骨体不恒，有大贵之表，年又最寿', 'en': 'Striking looks and a sturdy frame betokens Sun Quan’s great nobility, heroism and longevity.'}

title: {'zh': '勇健名将', 'en': 'of Exceptional Dexterity'}
description: {'zh': '太史慈弓马娴熟，武艺无不精通', 'en': 'From horse-riding to archery, Taishi Ci excels in all manner of physical pursuits.'}

title: {'zh': '仁厚长者', 'en': 'Benevolent Arbiter'}
description: {'zh': '外慕声名，内非真正，待人虽厚，其势必薄', 'en': 'Tao Qian may be a highly influential and ambitious figure, but expansionism is not on his personal agenda.'}

title: {'zh': '高才博雅', 'en': 'Ardent Educator'}
description: {'zh': '叔季之世，教化陵迟，王朗仍孜孜传学，勤勉不已', 'en': 'A keen imparter of knowledge, even when it is neither wanted nor welcome.'}

title: {'zh': '烈义英雄', 'en': 'The Righteous Hero'}
description: {'zh': '王修烈义人尽皆知，其所侍之主无不赞其忠勇仗义', 'en': 'Never can it be said that Wang Xiu was ever disloyal, dishonourable or unwilling to come to the aid of those he serves.'}

title: {'zh': '反骨虎狼', 'en': 'Disobedient Tiger'}
description: {'zh': '魏延脑后有反骨，食其禄而杀其主，是不忠也；居其土而献其地，是不义也', 'en': 'For the distrustful Wei Yan, a violent betrayal always simmers below the surface.'}

title: {'zh': '气焰灼天', 'en': 'Fierce Firebrand'}
description: {'zh': '「若吾上将文丑在此，必无忧矣！」', 'en': '"If only Wen Chou were here, I’d have nothing to fear!"'}

title: {'zh': '江东乱党', 'en': 'Southern Rebel'}
description: {'zh': '“你或许能占了我的土地，但你永远夺不走我的自由！你真的做得到吗？”', 'en': '"You can take my lands, but you\'ll never take my freedom. Oh, oh you actually can?"'}

title: {'zh': '急烈悍将', 'en': 'Hot-headed Officer'}
description: {'zh': '夏侯惇以烈气闻，知之者莫与为敌', 'en': 'Those who know Xiahou Dun know not to get on his bad side.'}

title: {'zh': '独眼孤狼', 'en': 'The One-eyed Exile'}
description: {'zh': '「此人单是左目中箭后所为之事，便让人不寒而栗……」', 'en': '"You really don\'t want to know what he did with his eye after losing it to that arrow…"'}

title: {'zh': '千里袭人', 'en': 'Maker of Ways'}
description: {'zh': '典军校尉夏侯渊，三日五百，六日一千', 'en': 'When it comes to military logistics, where there’s a will, Xiahou Yuan has a way.'}

title: {'zh': '虎痴', 'en': 'Tiger Fool'}
description: {'zh': '许褚性谨慎奉法，质重少言，实乃虎狼之士也', 'en': 'Xu Chu is a man of simple thoughts and principles, but an impressive warrior who fights with a bestial rage.'}

title: {'zh': '激愤臣属', 'en': 'Resentful Underling'}
description: {'zh': '“此仇必报，休要得意！”', 'en': '"One day you\'ll see, oh you\'ll see, you\'ll ALL see!"'}

title: {'zh': '铁壁将军', 'en': 'Guardian of the Gates'}
description: {'zh': '徐晃为守，不动如山，欲避其锋芒亦属难事', 'en': 'When assigned to guardianship, Xu Huang is an immovable sentinel, requiring a tremendous effort to bypass.'}

title: {'zh': '缄口无言', 'en': 'Disguised Diplomat'}
description: {'zh': '身在曹营心在汉', 'en': 'His body may be in one place, but his heart is in quite another.'}

title: {'zh': '高尚守护', 'en': 'Gracious Protector'}
description: {'zh': '“躲到我身后！”', 'en': '"Get behind me!"'}

title: {'zh': '贤辅君子', 'en': 'Gentleman Attendant'}
description: {'zh': '荀攸劳心智士，可谓算无遗策', 'en': 'A member of the learned scholar-gentry, Xun You is a profound thinker of great insight.'}

title: {'zh': '王佐之才', 'en': "Hegemon's Aide"}
description: {'zh': '「此吾之子房也！」', 'en': '"Here comes my Zifang!"'}

title: {'zh': '东吴德王', 'en': 'The White Tiger'}
description: {'zh': '“德王严白虎在此，谁敢不从！”', 'en': '"I am Yan Baihu, the White Tiger, hear my roar!"'}

title: {'zh': '奋勇当锋', 'en': 'Valiant Vanguard'}
description: {'zh': '颜良勇冠三军，河北军中倚为长城', 'en': 'A foremost general of considerable military prowess, the gutsy Yan Liang is unmatched among ordinary warriors.'}

title: {'zh': '幼虎', 'en': 'Tiger Cub'}
description: {'zh': '龇牙幼虎未必能成万兽之王。', 'en': 'The most furious cub may not necessarily become the most ferocious tiger.'}

title: {'zh': '毅重严整', 'en': 'Enforcer of the Law'}
description: {'zh': '于禁最号毅重，持军严整，以法御下，抚众则和，奉令无犯', 'en': 'As an imperious, by-the-book disciplinarian, Yu Jin rules his subordinates with fear and drilled-in obedience.'}

title: {'zh': '宠爱之子', 'en': 'Favoured Son'}
description: {'zh': '成为被选中之人，本身已是一种荣誉。而能够主宰自己的血脉，则可称之为天赐之福。', 'en': "To be chosen is an accolade in its own right. To take the reigns of one's own lineage? Perhaps that is a blessing."}

title: {'zh': '超凡将帅', 'en': 'Preeminent Commander'}
description: {'zh': '袁绍四世三公，自是机敏自重，心居骄慢', 'en': "Yuan Shao's astuteness, dignity and arrogance are the mark of his ancestors, many of whom served emperors past."}

title: {'zh': '狼贪虎视', 'en': 'Ambitious Powermonger'}
description: {'zh': '袁术矜名尚奇，而天性骄肆。如此是福是祸，诸君姑且看之', 'en': 'Yuan Shu is an ambitious but overconfident individual – time will tell whether such qualities shall trip him or aid his desires.'}

title: {'zh': '阳平之狮', 'en': 'The Lion of Yangping'}
description: {'zh': '乐进容貌短小，然其胆烈善射，每战先登', 'en': 'What Yue Jin lacks in stature he makes up for in fierceness, fearlessness, and deadliness with his bow.'}

title: {'zh': '笔走龙蛇', 'en': 'Flowing Calligrapher'}
description: {'zh': '其书蚕头燕尾，非饱学之士不能为也', 'en': 'Such graceful skills with ink and brush are the mark a man of great education and scholarly puissance.'}

title: {'zh': '豪饮狂战', 'en': 'Drunken Brawler'}
description: {'zh': '「酒你先拿着…」', 'en': '"Hold my wine…"'}

title: {'zh': '巧变勇将', 'en': 'Courageous General'}
description: {'zh': '张郃识变量，善处营陈，料战势地形，无不如计', 'en': 'Zhang He’s fearlessness enables him to retain his composure when having to adapt to unfavourable situations.'}

title: {'zh': '铲灭暴政', 'en': 'Slayer of Tyrants'}
description: {'zh': '「官府民贼，必遭天罚」', 'en': '"The unjust rulers of the old regime shall perish."'}

title: {'zh': '止啼飞龙', 'en': 'The Heavenly Dragon General'}
description: {'zh': '张辽统御师旅，当敌制决，真大将之材也', 'en': 'The model of professionalism and organisation, Zhang Liao has heavenly leadership skills.'}

title: {'zh': '师君', 'en': 'Celestial Master'}
description: {'zh': '张鲁自守以平万难，如滴水而穿石', 'en': 'Just as water penetrates mountains, Zhang Lu always seeks to overcome hardness by his own accord.'}

title: {'zh': '黑山大王', 'en': 'King of Black Mountain'}
description: {'zh': '此人占山为王，党羽众多，世人谓之「飞燕」', 'en': "With his scores of followers, the bandit leader known as 'Flying Swallow' wields the influence of a king."}

title: {'zh': '等闲诸侯', 'en': 'Ignored Warlord'}
description: {'zh': '此人为诸侯所弃，无人信任，其命运如何，无人可知', 'en': 'What is the fate of he who is forsaken and unjustly distrusted by his fellow warlords? Only heaven knows.'}

title: {'zh': '乱世腾龙', 'en': 'Light in the Dark'}
description: {'zh': '赵云克定祸乱，光明洞达，自是大臣局量，不止名将而已', 'en': 'In the darkest times of war, the auras of the most resplendent warriors gleam brightest.'}

title: {'zh': '魁首', 'en': 'Bandit Queen'}
description: {'zh': '郑姜大掠四海，其猛烈不言自明', 'en': 'Hell-bent on plunder, Zheng Jiang goes to unspeakable lengths to obtain her loot.'}

title: {'zh': '归正匪贼', 'en': 'Reformed Brigand'}
description: {'zh': '别让周泰曲折事迹或坚毅外表欺骗了你——他对主公向来是忠心耿耿。', 'en': "Do not let Zhou Tai's chequered past and grim expression mislead you - he will serve his master with a fierce loyalty."}

title: {'zh': '雅好音律', 'en': 'Melodic Strategist'}
description: {'zh': '「曲有误，周郎顾」', 'en': '"If there is a mistake in the tune, Zhou Yu will look up."'}

title: {'zh': '无常太守', 'en': 'Inconstant Administrator'}
description: {'zh': '过去是怎么做的，如今无须照做！', 'en': 'Just because you did it one way in the past, is no reason to do it the same way now!'}

title: {'zh': '饱读之士', 'en': 'Bookish Scholar'}
description: {'zh': '诸葛瑾少治诗书，可谓饱读之士', 'en': 'Having studied history and poetry in years past, Zhuge Jin is a man who appreciates scholarship.'}

title: {'zh': '卧龙', 'en': 'Sleeping Dragon'}
description: {'zh': '诸葛亮权智英略，夷扫万险只在谈笑之间', 'en': 'A peerless genius and insightful strategist, there are few situations that Zhuge Liang’s astute intellect cannot overcome. '}

title: {'zh': '星象家', 'en': 'Astrologer'}
description: {'zh': '天象的运动是对我们的指引，而此人便是能参透其中奥妙之人', 'en': 'The movement of the celestial bodies are there to guide us; this one has the talent to interpret them.'}

title: {'zh': '道士', 'en': 'Monk'}
description: {'zh': '此人一心向道，寻求教化并教化世人', 'en': 'This one has given themselves fully to the Way, to become enlightened and to enlighten others.'}

title: {'zh': '贤哲', 'en': 'Philosopher'}
description: {'zh': '此人深暗学识乃是解决困难的基石，其无惧未知的考验', 'en': 'This person understands that all knowledge is a stepping stone to greater questions and is unafraid to grapple with the unknown.'}

title: {'zh': '术士', 'en': 'Sorcerer'}
description: {'zh': '据说此人可与灵魂沟通，或是治愈他人，或是诅咒他人', 'en': 'It is whispered that this one can talk with the spirits to call upon their powers to heal, or if angered, curse others.'}

title: {'zh': '文学家', 'en': 'Writer'}
description: {'zh': '文学大家叙事总能做到简明扼要', 'en': 'A good writer keeps things clear and succinct.'}

title: {'zh': '酿酒师', 'en': 'Brewer'}
description: {'zh': '天下不乏各种能工巧匠，而此人尤为高尚：以杜康佳酿解百姓之饥渴', 'en': 'China has many noble professions, but this person has chosen the noblest: to quench people’s thirst with beer.'}

title: {'zh': '筑工', 'en': 'Builder'}
description: {'zh': '完成一座建筑不仅需要高超的技艺进行搭建，也需要靠远见和卓识来进行设计', 'en': 'Realising a building not only requires the technical skill to build, but the imagination to envision and design it.'}

title: {'zh': '农民', 'en': 'Farmer'}
description: {'zh': '世乱扰心，唯农静心', 'en': 'When life’s chaos threatens to overwhelm, this one takes to the field to clear their mind by working the land.'}

title: {'zh': '玉雕工', 'en': 'Jade Carver'}
description: {'zh': '玉载厚德，所言无声。经年细琢，方露大道。', 'en': 'Years of practice have given this one the precision and patience needed to carve jade.'}

title: {'zh': '陶匠', 'en': 'Potter'}
description: {'zh': '「我这里什么都有，大碗、中碗、小碗。什么，酒杯？你真的不要上好的碗吗？」', 'en': '"I have everything - large bowls, small bowls, tiny bowls. A cup? Are you sure you wouldn’t rather have a nice bowl instead?"'}

title: {'zh': '谋士', 'en': 'Advisor'}
description: {'zh': '此人胸中有大才，有着寻常人所不及的独到见解，考虑事务也是面面俱到', 'en': 'This person possesses one of those invaluable minds that can quickly understand facts and consider the possibilities from all angles.'}

title: {'zh': '歌者', 'en': 'Singer'}
description: {'zh': '此人歌咏，不仅抒意。纳髓己用，方悟大道。', 'en': 'When this one sings, they manage to carry the original intention of the music while imbuing it with something new.'}

title: {'zh': '占卜师', 'en': 'Fortune-teller'}
description: {'zh': '「我可告知阁下日后的命数，只是无论好坏，万望阁下莫要怪罪。」', 'en': '"I can tell you your future, but I cannot guarantee whether or not you will be glad of what you hear."'}

title: {'zh': '乐师', 'en': 'Musician'}
description: {'zh': '此人奏乐之时，时间仿佛为之凝滞', 'en': 'When this one plays, the world pauses for a short while to listen.'}

title: {'zh': '医师', 'en': 'Physician'}
description: {'zh': '此人深谙医术，能为人疏通经络、调理气血', 'en': 'When someone falls ill, they call on this person to unblock their Qi and restore balance.'}

title: {'zh': '机警幕僚', 'en': 'Observant Advisor'}
description: {'zh': '司马玮的心腹密友；经常能注意到他人未能察觉之处', 'en': "Sima Wei's confidante; often sees things that others do not"}

title: {'zh': '尽忠校尉', 'en': 'Loyal Officer'}
description: {'zh': '司马越之心，却不影响此人，此人仍是忠贞能干的幕僚', 'en': 'Although subordinate to Sima Yue, he is a loyal and capable advisor'}

title: {'zh': '引导大师', 'en': 'Facilitator'}
description: {'zh': '与李含争斗多年，现投奔司马乂帐下，或战或贸，无论何地。', 'en': 'Has fought Li Han for years, now works on behalf of Sima Ai, fighting wars or making deals wherever needed'}

title: {'zh': '知名学者', 'en': 'Renowned Scholar'}
description: {'zh': '此人文章冠世，以太康诗风闻名天下。然而他是否擅长统御尚不得而知', 'en': 'Famed thoughout the realm as a gifted writer and literary critic. However, his ability as a commander remains... questionable.'}

title: {'zh': '资深掮客', 'en': 'Skilled Mediator'}
description: {'zh': '司马颖亲近的幕僚，以其才能和忠诚闻名', 'en': "Sima Ying's close advisor, known for being capable and loyal"}

title: {'zh': '未雨绸缪', 'en': 'Insightful Survivalist'}
description: {'zh': '此人目光如炬，意志坚定', 'en': 'This one is gifted with insight and adamant perseverance.'}

title: {'zh': '机谋主簿', 'en': 'Cunning Clerk'}
description: {'zh': '于司马玮帐下担任副手与幕僚，其诡诈多端的洞察力使人带来胜利，抑或毁灭', 'en': 'Assistant and advisor to Sima Wei - his wily observations may direct one to glory or to ruin'}

title: {'zh': '中护军', 'en': 'Central Army Protector'}
description: {'zh': '这位将才目睹朝代兴衰更迭，他也数次易主', 'en': 'A talented general who has seen dynasties fall as his loyalties shifted'}

title: {'zh': '清正廉明', 'en': 'Principled Administrator'}
description: {'zh': '「在下不敢苟同，请参阅此书中第五小章，第九列……」', 'en': '"I am afraid I cannot allow that. You see, in sub-section five, paragraph nine..."'}

title: {'zh': '玉雕工', 'en': 'Jade Carver'}
description: {'zh': '他是司马亮之子，由于没能世袭王位，他急切希望能证明自己的价值', 'en': "Sima Liang's son. Not being titled as prince has given him a desire to prove his worth"}

title: {'zh': '独掌大权', 'en': 'Imperious Regent'}
description: {'zh': '「摄政如空气一般，看不见也感觉不到，但重要性丝毫不弱」', 'en': '"A regent is like air; unseen and barely felt, but vital all the same."'}

title: {'zh': '局外储君', 'en': 'Outsider Heir'}
description: {'zh': '他是司马亮的儿子和储君，虽然被视为局外人，但不可低估其实力', 'en': "Sima Liang's son and heir, considered an outsider but not to be underestimated"}

title: {'zh': '众望所归', 'en': 'Rightful Regent'}
description: {'zh': '名帝司马懿之子，一直隐于暗处，坐视晋朝江山祸乱渐起', 'en': 'Son of the legendary Sima Yi, he has watched the Jin dynasty scuffle in his shadow.'}

title: {'zh': '篡逆之王', 'en': 'Usurper Prince'}
description: {'zh': '「晋王朝会在一位聪明而名副其实的天子手中延续；此人便是孤！」', 'en': '"The Jin dynasty will endure under a wise and deserving emperor - me!"'}

title: {'zh': '狂烈悍将', 'en': 'Tempestuous General'}
description: {'zh': '他逞凶好斗是讹传，脾性暴躁倒是真性情', 'en': 'His reputation for belligerence is perhaps undeserved. Not so his famously short temper.'}

title: {'zh': '万民景仰', 'en': 'Beloved Governor'}
description: {'zh': '尽管朝廷豺狼当道，但司马颖总是心系百姓', 'en': 'Madness may grip the court, but Sima Ying will always think of his people.'}

title: {'zh': '精明卫士', 'en': 'Shrewd Defender'}
description: {'zh': '司马颙自感守护天子职责重大，他的忠诚无从动摇', 'en': 'Sima Yong has a duty to the emperor, and his loyalty will never waver.'}

title: {'zh': '监察宇内', 'en': 'Imperial Overseer'}
description: {'zh': '「我们必须对一切进行监督，尤其是国家的重大事务」', 'en': '"There must be oversight in all things, especially important matters of state."'}

title: {'zh': '通同结党', 'en': 'Partisan'}
description: {'zh': '「主公，关于此事，我有更具说服力的观点……」', 'en': '"If I may, my lord, I have a rather compelling argument..."'}

title: {'zh': '勇毅传道', 'en': 'Steadfast Preacher'}
description: {'zh': '于司马冏摄政期间入朝为臣，生性顽固，口无遮拦，可能会为自己带来麻烦', 'en': "Courtier of Sima Jiong's regency. Has strong beliefs and a loose tongue that may cause him trouble"}

title: {'zh': '说客', 'en': 'Mediator'}
description: {'zh': '这个人知道如何把蛋糕分成每个人都认为自己分得最大的那一块', 'en': 'This person knows how to divide the cake in such a way that everyone believes they have the biggest slice.'}

title: {'zh': '坚定猛将', 'en': 'Uncompromising Warrior'}
description: {'zh': '当为主公而战时，张方并不会有引致百姓伤亡之类的顾虑', 'en': "When fighting for his master, Zhang Fang is not known to concern himself with scruples like 'civilian casualties'"}

title: {'zh': '饱学多才', 'en': 'Academic'}
description: {'zh': '此人孜孜不倦，深晓经论', 'en': 'This one sees the value of institutionalised learning, and has embraced it.'}
